ModMetaData.name: Rim of Madness - Werewolves
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
V1.18.0.0 Adds Werewolves to RimWorld.
Quick Werewolf Guide 1) Find a character with the Werewolf trait. 2) Werewolves will unlock their first transformation during a full moon. 3) When a Werewolf has transformed at least one time, it is called a blooded werewolf, and blooded Werewolves can learn more forms with Full Moon Fury enabled (next to the Draft button) during future full moons.
Werewolf Forms -> Glabro - Near Man -> Crinos - Battle Form Werewolf -> Hispo - Near Wolf -> Lupus - Wolf Form -> ????? - Secret
